# init(forLocale:usage:)

**Initializer**

Creates a `UnitSpeed` which the specified `locale` prefers for the specific `usage`.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(forLocale: Locale, usage: MeasurementFormatUnitUsage<UnitSpeed> = .general)
```
title: init(forLocale:usage:)
